| Property     | Attribute     | Description             | Type               | Default           |
| ------------ | ------------- | ----------------------- | ------------------ | ----------------- |
| `isChecked`  | `is-checked`  | HTML checked attribute  | `boolean`          | `undefined`       |
| `isDisabled` | `is-disabled` | HTML disabled attribute | `boolean`          | `undefined`       |
| `label`      | `label`       | Label text              | `string`           | `undefined`       |
| `maxLength`  | `max-length`  |                         | `number`           | `undefined`       |
| `maxValue`   | `max-value`   |                         | `number \| string` | `undefined`       |
| `minLength`  | `min-length`  |                         | `number`           | `undefined`       |
| `minValue`   | `min-value`   |                         | `number \| string` | `undefined`       |
| `name`       | `name`        | HTML name attribute     | `string`           | `undefined`       |
| `type`       | `type`        |                         | `InputTypes`       | `InputTypes.TEXT` |
| `value`      | `value`       | HTML value attribute    | `string`           | `undefined`       |


## Events

| Event         | Description                                       | Type                      |
| ------------- | ------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------- |
| `scaleBlur`   | HTML onBlur event                                 | `CustomEvent<FocusEvent>` |
